typeProperties.message: UR pipeline has no data to update OR it FAiled

text.value:
SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM @{pipeline().parameters.schema}.@{pipeline().parameters.table} WHERE last_updated >
@{activity('Reading_CDC-json').output.firstRow.cdc_timestamp}

SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM @{pipeline().parameters.schema}.@{pipeline().parameters.table} WHERE last_updated > '@{if(empty(pipeline().parameters.backdate),activity('Reading_CDC-json').output.firstRow.cdc_timestamp,pipeline().parameters.backdate)}'

scripts.text: create table BOOKS (sr_no int, name varchar(15),author varchar(20) , genre varchar(15))
update BOOKS set name='Z' where sr_no=1
